_config:Query._config:SQL: SELECT CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID, CATENTRYATTR.ATTR_ID, CATENTRYATTR.ATTRVAL_ID, ATTRVALDESC.LANGUAGE_ID FROM CATENTRY INNER JOIN CATENTRYATTR ON CATENTRYATTR.CATENTRY_ID = CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID INNER JOIN ATTR ON ATTR.ATTR_ID = CATENTRYATTR.ATTR_ID INNER JOIN ATTRVAL ON ATTRVAL.ATTRVAL_ID = CATENTRYATTR.ATTRVAL_ID INNER JOIN ATTRVALDESC ON ATTRVALDESC.ATTRVAL_ID = ATTRVAL.ATTRVAL_ID INNER JOIN ATTRDICTGRPATTRREL ON ATTRDICTGRPATTRREL.ATTR_ID = ATTR.ATTR_ID WHERE CATENTRY.MARKFORDELETE = 0 AND ATTRVALDESC.LANGUAGE_ID = -1 AND ATTR.IDENTIFIER LIKE 'EMR Utility Belt_%' -- Utility Belt AND TO_CHAR(CATENTRYATTR.SEQUENCE) IN ('0','.0001','.0002','1','1.0001','1.0002','2','2.0001','2.0002') AND CATENTRY.MEMBER_ID = (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM STOREENT WHERE STOREENT_ID = ?) ORDER BY CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID, CATENTRYATTR.ATTR_ID, CATENTRYATTR.ATTRVAL_ID, ATTRVALDESC.LANGUAGE_ID, CATENTRYATTR.SEQUENCE

SELECT CATENTRY.PARTNUMBER, CATENTRYATTR.SEQUENCE, ATTR.IDENTIFIER AS "ATTRIDENTIFIER", ATTRVALDESC.VALUE, ATTRVAL.IDENTIFIER AS "ATTRVALIDENTIFIER", ATTRVALDESC.LANGUAGE_ID FROM CATENTRY INNER JOIN CATENTRYATTR ON CATENTRYATTR.CATENTRY_ID = CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID INNER JOIN ATTR ON ATTR.ATTR_ID = CATENTRYATTR.ATTR_ID INNER JOIN ATTRVAL ON ATTRVAL.ATTRVAL_ID = CATENTRYATTR.ATTRVAL_ID INNER JOIN ATTRVALDESC ON ATTRVALDESC.ATTRVAL_ID = ATTRVAL.ATTRVAL_ID INNER JOIN ATTRDICTGRPATTRREL ON ATTRDICTGRPATTRREL.ATTR_ID = ATTR.ATTR_ID WHERE CATENTRY.MARKFORDELETE = 0 AND ATTR.IDENTIFIER LIKE 'EMR Utility Belt_%' -- Utility Belt AND TO_CHAR(CATENTRYATTR.SEQUENCE) IN ('0','.0001','.0002','1','1.0001','1.0002','2','2.0001','2.0002') AND CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID = ? AND CATENTRYATTR.ATTR_ID = ? AND CATENTRYATTR.ATTRVAL_ID = ? AND ATTRVALDESC.LANGUAGE_ID = ? ORDER BY CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID, CATENTRYATTR.ATTR_ID, CATENTRYATTR.ATTRVAL_ID, ATTRVALDESC.LANGUAGE_ID, CATENTRYATTR.SEQUENCE
